metadata.title: CVE-2023-25399 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
A refcounting issue which leads to potential memory leak was discovered inscipy commit 8627df31ab in Py_FindObjects() function.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-25399` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-scipy - 1.3.3-3ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: scipy package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.3.3-3ubuntu0.1~esm1').
